comment.author: 87914514@N00
comment._content: this looks like a more recent photo from the side of the building: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/robweststrate/1150799090/] and another: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/robweststrate/1149960021/] there's also a flickr group dedicated to the Architects Johannes Brinkman and Leendert van der Vlugt: www.flickr.com/groups/835703@N25/ and a website: www.rotterdam.nl/tekst:woonhuis_van_der_leeuw and here it is in google streetview: maps.google.ca/maps?q=google++map+Kralingse+Plaslaan+38,+...

comment.author: 78745038@N04
comment._content: My husband owns a piano movers company, and he says that they move into buildings like this every so often. I am in the united states though. I'll tell him to take pictures when he moves to a home similar to this and post them. Thanks for sharing!

comment.author: 47154409@N06
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/78745038@N04] I'd like that! I'm curious to know what these buildings look like. Thanks!

comment._content: Its something new to see for sure. I'm excited to see how it turns out. Need to set up some memorial monuments for stuff like this. monuments
